name: Never Have I Ever Game!
description:
Never Have I Ever is a fun game for parties and drinking! That means it would be great if your friends and your group consists of adults only. We also hope you will have some alcohol,shots, beer or cocktails with you. Because this game night is only starting.

The more people you have, the crazier will this night become.

You read the statements, and drink if you've done the deed. If you have never done it don't drink.

That's all you need to know.

The statements are divided between 7 categories. If you don't want to talk about some topic, don't use that deck.

If you are too young, or easily offended, or you don't want to let people get to know you, this is not a the game for you.

Hope you have an awesome time.
